name: 3D Platformer: Space Cave Collector
description:
This is my 3D Platformer: Space Cave Collector.

Modifications in this game include:

1) Added some fun custom music for the Main Menu.

2) Created two complete, interesting levels

3) Modified the out-of-game menu and all other menus.

4) Reskinned some of the existing graphics and new environment features.

Other less significant modifications that I added into my game include music and sound effect changes, small changes in enemy behaviors, and changes in color scheme. Enjoy!

Created by Lula Karakitsos
